div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 627 Nucii, 40 km. NNE of Bucharest, Ru- mania, 1960 Burial: early 1st cent. B.C. (Mitrea) Contents: c. 50 AR Thasos: spread-flan tetradr. incl. imit. Disposition: Bucharest 45 (Inst. Arch. 40; Hist. Mus. 5) Preda, SCIV 1966, pp. 370-2, illus.
